name: All Stars Racing Cup
description: Push your driving skills to the limit in this vibrant, fun, arcade-style racing game! Can you master every track to become the next All Star? We plan to donate 5% of all sales to charity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 950 2 GB or similar Storage: 1 GB available space
